disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from The Hitman and the Seer.

blurb.value: Innate: Aphelios wields 5 Lunari Weapons made by his sister Alune. He has access to two at a time: main weapon and off-hand weapon. Each weapon has a unique basic attack and active ability.

blurb2.value: Moonlight: Attacks and abilities consume a weapon's ammo. When out of ammo, Aphelios discards the weapon to the reserve and Alune summons the next of the 5.

description.value: Innate: Aphelios has access to an arsenal of 5 Moonstone Weapons, created by his sister Alune. He equips two weapons at any one time, one as his main weapon and one as his off-hand. Each weapon has a unique basic attack and passive effect.

description2.value: Aphelios begins the game with Calibrum as his main weapon and Severum in his off-hand, with Gravitum, Infernum, and Crescendum queued in reserve. The queue order can be rearranged based on weapon usage.

description3.value: Innate - Moonlight: Weapons spawn with 50 Moonlight for ammunition, which is consumed on basic attacks or to cast his abilities. Abilities that cause Aphelios to attack do not cost additional Moonlight on top of their ability cost. Once his main weapon is exhausted of Moonlight, it is moved to the end of the queue and Aphelios channels for 1 second to equip the next available weapon from his reserve.

description4.value: Innate - Weapon Master: Aphelios cannot improve his abilities with skill points. He starts the game with Phase and gains access to abilities at level 2. He gains access to Moonlight Vigil at level 6, which improves automatically at levels 11 and 16. Instead, Aphelios may spend his skill points to gain  bonus attack damage,  bonus attack speed or  lethality.

leveling4.value:
Bonus Attack Damage:4 / 8 / 12 / 16 / 20 / 24
Bonus Attack Speed:6 / 12 / 18 / 24 / 30 / 36%
Lethality:2 / 4 / 6 / 8 / 10 / 12

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The level up for the bonus attack damage, attack speed, and armor penetration have hotkeys Q, W, E, respectively. Assigning points does not follow the same rules as conventional point expenditure. The quickest you can get an individual statistic to rank-6 is by assigning points at 1 / 2 / 3 / 5 / 7 / 9. An ammunition counter will appear to the right side of the screen at 10 or less Moonlight. Abilities can still be used with less than the required amount of Moonlight, consuming all remaining Moonlight in the process. Runaan's Hurricane does not consume additional Moonlight for his basic attacks. The icon for this ability changes based on the active skin and functions as Alune's portrait, similarly to Aphelios' portrait.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Weapons of the Faithful.

blurb.value: The active effect of Aphelios' varies based on his current main weapon. Calibrum - Moonshot: Long range shot that marks its target for a long-range follow-up attack. Severum - Onslaught: Gain  bonus movement speed while attacking a single enemy with both weapons. Gravitum - Binding Eclipse: Root all enemies who are * slowed by this weapon. Infernum - Duskwave: Blast enemies in a cone and attack them with your off-hand weapon. Crescendum - Sentry: Deploy a sentry that shoots your off-hand weapon.

description.value: The active effect of Aphelios' varies based on his current main hand weapon.

description2.value: The individual actives do not share a cooldown.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Moonlight Vigil.

blurb.value: Active: Aphelios fires a concentrated blast of moonlight that explodes on enemy champions dealing physical damage. Then basic attacks raining from the sky to them, dealing physical damage and applying unique effects of his main weapon. Calibrum: Applies an empowered mark on all target. Severum: The initial blast heals him, and so does the attacks. Gravitum: An empowered slow applied on all target. Infernum: The initial blast deals increased damage, and the attacks splashes on each target. Crescendum: Aphelios gains more mirror chakrams the more target he hit with the initial blast.

description.value: Active: Aphelios casts forth a lunar spotlight in the target direction that stops upon illuminating an enemy champion. Alune smites the area centered on the illuminated enemy, dealing 125 / 175 / 225 (based on level) (+ 20% bonus AD) (+ 100% AP) physical damage and locking-on to each enemy hit.

description2.value: After 0.3 seconds of the illumination, attacks will begin raining from the sky based on Aphelios' current main weapon, dealing 100% AD physical damage and applying on-hit effects upon each enemy locked-on by Moonlight Vigil. These attacks can critically strike for (20% +  25%) AD bonus physical damage. There is no  range limit for locked-on targets. Calibrum: Applies an empowered mark that deals 20 / 45 / 70 (based on level) additional physical damage per mark. Severum: If at least one enemy is hit, Aphelios heals for 200 / 300 / 400 (based on level). Gravitum: The initial slow is increased to 99%. Infernum: The initial blast deals an additional 50 / 100 / 150 (based on level) (+ 25% bonus AD) physical damage. Attacks splash in a 400 unit circle instead of a cone, dealing 75% of that damage. Enemies will take damage from overlapping areas. Crescendum: 3 additional spectral chakrams return to Aphelios from the first enemy hit, for a total of 4, on top of those from other enemies hit.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The basic attacks always count as projectiles unless Severum is being used. The lunar beam, however, may always be intercepted regardless of which weapon is in play as the main weapon. Spell shield blocks the Moonlight Vigil's initial detonation damage but does not prevent the attacks from locking-on. The basic attacks from Moonlight Vigil critically strike independently from each other. Targets further away from the center of the blast are hit after a slightly longer delay. These attacks do not apply on-attack effects. Changing weapons while Moonlight Vigil is in flight does not change the effect it has when it hits. Moonlight Vigil is always cast from the original casting position. With Calibrum, the extra damage from consuming the mark is a bonus damage on top of Calibrum's normal mark consumption damage. With Infernum, 14 fire bolts splash from each target hit (18 for critical strikes). This does not occur if the initial damage of Moonlight Vigil kills the target. With Crescendum, 1 spectral chakram is gained for every target hit by the blast, meaning it is possible to gain up to 8 spectral chakrams with one use of Moonlight Vigil if it hits 5 enemy champions. With Severum, the extra flat heal is given only once, not per target. However, all damage done by Moonlight Vigil with it also heals him from Severum's own passive effect. PENDING FOR TEST: Locked-on attacks' interaction with parrying effects ( dodge, block, blind). Moonlight Vigil has different visual effects changed accordingly to each weapon. This may vary depending on the skin, this showcases the default: Calibrum Severum Gravitum Infernum CrescendumJSSnippetsStack.push({dependencies:[{"url":"https://slot1-images.wikia.nocookie.net/__am/1599831878410/group/-/wikia_photo_gallery_js","type":"js"},{"url":"https://slot1-images.wikia.nocookie.net/__am/1599831878410/sass/background-dynamic%3Dtrue%26background-image%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fvignette.wikia.nocookie.net%252Fleagueoflegends%252Fimages%252F5%252F50%252FWiki-background%252Frevision%252Flatest%253Fcb%253D20200901074924%26background-image-height%3D1080%26background-image-width%3D1920%26color-body%3D%25230e1436%26color-body-middle%3D%2523000000%26color-buttons%3D%2523153b54%26color-community-header%3D%25230d1b2d%26color-header%3D%2523080f28%26color-links%3D%252370a8e0%26color-page%3D%25230d1b2d%26oasisTypography%3D1%26page-opacity%3D100%26widthType%3D0/extensions/wikia/WikiaPhotoGallery/css/gallery.scss","type":"css"}],callback:function(json){WikiaPhotoGalleryView.init(json)},id:"WikiaPhotoGalleryView.init"})
